about: I'm a software engineer with a passion for building things. I have a strong background in web development and I'm always looking for new challenges.

experience.description: I worked on a team of 5 developers to build a new web application from scratch. I was responsible for the front-end development and I also contributed to the back-end. We used React for the front-end and Node.js for the back-end.

I worked on a team of 10 developers to maintain and improve an existing web application. I was responsible for the front-end development and I also contributed to the back-end. We used Angular for the front-end and Java for the back-end.

education.description: I studied computer science and graduated with a bachelor's degree.

courses.description: I took an online course to learn React and improve my front-end development skills.

certificates.description: I took an online exam and received a certificate for my React skills.

footer: This resume was generated using a JSON file and a Node.js script. You can find the source code on GitHub.
